name: 3D Frog Frenzy
description:
Retro arcade action.... Best selling "3D Frog Frenzy" is now on the iPhone and Ipad!

Frog hoppin' fun! Froggy is trying to escape the city... but he can't swim. He really needs your help. Guide our little frog friend through treacherous traffic and across ravenging rivers. Grab power-ups along the way to make the journey easier.

Incredible all new 3D graphics, cool music and non-stop arcade action!

Features:

* Over 20 hoppin' fun levels
* Cool power-ups
* High-score table
* Addicting game-play
* Super cool soundtrack
* Classic retro arcade fun

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
